name: terminate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to (cause something to) end or stop: They terminated my contract in October. This train will terminate at the next stop - passengers who wish to continue should change trains.
[ T ] to stop employing an employee: Employers must terminate all illegal employees. In most occupations, poorly performing workers can be terminated.
[ I or T ]
  medical
  specialized to end a pregnancy intentionally, usually by a medical operation: She made the difficult decision to terminate the pregnancy. Even the baby's father urged her to terminate.
